Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <Cragorn> @KingKillaz Did you check what miner to use and download on https://veruscoin.io/getVRSC.html ?
If I'm not very mistaken nheqminer is for CPU, so trying to run GPU's on that should take you a lot more than 5 hours to fix. Did you not read the Readme.txt when trying to troubleshoot? It does mention all over how to setup you bat for your CPU. Have a go with the CCMiner CUDA (Nvidia GPU) or the CCMiner OCL (AMD GPU) and you should be sorted üëç

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Cragorn> I am running both CPU and GPU mining on this PC right now and it's working as intended, so if you are having problems after running a GPU miner just post questions in #mining or #community-support to get help.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> Hey all does anyone know how much of an impact wallet balance has on staking?

For example if you have 500coins vs 10,000coins. Will there be a considerable difference in how often you "stake"?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> I believe there is some influence just not sure how much

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <zpajk> 20x500vrsc *should* stake just as well as 1x10000vrsc.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> you mean 20 wallets with 500vrsc all staking should be on par with 1 wallet with 10,000vrsc

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <zpajk> ‚Äúutxo‚Äù; you‚Äôre staking each transaction in transparent addresses (R\*), not the ‚Äútotal amount‚Äù in your wallet as one unit of amount.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <zpajk> Then you have to consider which period of time to average the result, and the variance of total staking funds on the network over time, hence luck of each address. Why __average__ is often emphasized when mentioning staking.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> can you provide an example with the param's used in the equation for solving the average?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> I understand its a prediction but still fun for me

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <zpajk> Not sure I understand the question. Params where? Other than the general; occurrences divided by time spent.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> Occurrences being blocks found in 24h?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Robert-> Or transactions

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <zpajk> There's a few different versions of spreadsheet calculators pinned in #staking 
<https://github.com/Oink70/Staking-calculator/releases/download/v1.1/Verus_POS.xlsx>
Fill in the current blockheight and funds staking to get a guesstimate. You can't know the current total amount staking on the network, which is why it's hard to predict accurately.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <zpajk> !vrsctip blockheight
